title: 003 ERROR
body:
HELLO as my previous post i get a message popping in my client 
[previous post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sEbPVwah-error-003)

hextech repair didn't solve it.

**i assume it has something to do with RUNES. ( because it reset them )
**

BUG or whatsoever is not fixed

LOOKING FOR solution. HELP

replies.body:
Those 003 errors aren't related to runes really, but they're most often related to how stable your connection was with the patching servers. Double check your network settings using the [**connection FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a guide, and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some network logs if that doesn't help.

Sometimes you can run into permissions errors as well, so be sure to run through the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to cover your bases!
